#Chloroquine & #Hydroxychloroquine are possible #Treatment for #Novel #Coronavirus illness. But there have been growing concerns about the #Impact of these #Drugs on the #Heart.
#Hospitals in #Sweden have been #Cautioned against using the #Drugs.
